PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02762022-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 241, British Columbia
PrecisOrder authorizing the PROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER No. 241 in order to (1) declare federal concern and (2) authorize the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness to provide financial assistance to BRITISH COLUMBIA with respect to the flooding and landslides that occurred in British Columbia in November 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
